text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington, D.C. 20036
MEMORANDUM
To: Executive Committee of the January 12, 1966
NAEB Board of Directors
I have attached some background material for the Executive
Committee meeting scheduled January 20-21, 1966, in Washington at
the Dupont Plaza Hotel.
The staff has held lengthy and productive meetings that were
stimulated by the recommendations of the Arthur Young and
Company report, and we look forward to reviewing with you a
number of our suggestions for further steps.
The agenda for the meeting, a copy of the Arthur Young and
Company report, and information concerning the proposed revision
of the current budget, and a proposal for 1966-67 are included
for your study before the meeting.
I look forward to seeing you next week. If any additional
arrangements need to be made for your trip here, please let me
know.
JAF:sc
William G. Harley
President
